title: Service disruption on East West Line due to signalling fault

title_translations.zh-Hans: 东西线因信号故障导致服务中断
title_translations.ms: Gangguan perkhidmatan di Laluan Timur Barat disebabkan oleh kerosakan isyarat
title_translations.ta: சிக்னலிங் கோளாறு காரணமாக கிழக்கு மேற்கு பாதையில் சேவை இடையூறு

updates.text: [EWL]UPDATE: Train services are progressively being restored to normal btwn #Queenstown & #Bugis.
[EWL] UPDATE: We have stopped free regular bus services between #Queenstown and #Bugis.
[EWL] UPDATE: Pls cater 15 mins additional travel time between #Queenstown & #Bugis. We are working to recover service.
[EWL]Update: Due to a signalling fault, pls add 25mins travel time between #Queenstown & #Bugis. Train service is available.
[EWL]: Due to a signalling fault, pls add 15mins travel time between #Queenstown & #Bugis. Train service is available.
